name: Betelgeuse (itch) (Atcan)
description:
You can touch the stars!
Story:
     You fell asleep, can't wake up and u must pass the all. Don't forget the use your grappling gun it's useful. The star will run out of fuel you must be quick.

Gameplay:    
     Run , jump your way through colorful levels and go fast as you can.

Controls:
W A S D - Move
Spacebar - Jump / Double Tap - Double Jump
Left Mouse - Grappling Gun
Press R -  Respawn
